p: The cost of installation of solar powered charging stations varies with location and the local economy; values from $10,000 to 20,000 per parking space have been used in [2]. When an entire parking lot is covered with solar panels, the installation costs are less than for a small project with several parking spaces. Generally, the operating cost for an EV will be less than that for a gasoline vehicle. The value of shaded parking contributes positively to the economics of solar powered charging stations.
